content.p: Your Support Plan may include note-taking support in lectures, accessible course materials in alternative formats, exam support workers and alternative exam arrangements, such as exams in smaller venues, rest breaks or extra time. Other support that we can offer is detailed below and you can contact us by emailing Disability Support Services where you will be allocated a Disability Adviser to discuss your support with you. The Thomas Pocklington Trust is a national charity that supports blind and partially sighted people. They also have a Student Support Service.
